column1: In a world of busyness bordering on madness (referring here to fanatical and foolish behaviour and not to serious mental_illness), technological dominance, and constant, unreflective activity, a renewed spirituality of the Sabbath is essential for a flourishing, fulfilling and spiritual life, for both children and adults.
